activities: VoloMetrix uses the information it collects directly from its users (e.g., through www.volometrix.com) to provide, maintain and improve the website; provide and deliver the products and services users request; respond to comments and questions and provide customer service; communicate with users about products, services, offers, promotions and events; monitor and analyze trends, usage and activities in connection with the website; and carry out any other purpose for which the information was collected.  VoloMetrix may also act as an agent and process information about data subjects in the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland on behalf of its customers in connection with VoloMetrix's SaaS analytics application.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
